newsitem.title: USA: PRIMEX sees potential FY EPS $1.65.
newsitem.headline: PRIMEX sees potential FY EPS $1.65.

text.p: PRIMEX Technologies Inc said Thursday it sees the potential for earnings of around $1.65 per share for the year.

The company based its projection on a recent modification to one of its multi-year tank ammunition contracts with the Army, which it said would allow for the acceleration of $62 million of cash payments into the third quarter.
Wall Street expects the company to report earnings of $1.55 a share for fiscal 1997, according to First Call.
